text: Dragoș Petre Dumitriu (17 February 1964 – 13 November 2021) was a Romanian politician and journalist. He was a member of the Greater Romania Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 2004 to 2008. Dumitriu was diagnosed with COVID-19 in October 2021 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania. He died on 13 November 2021, from a heart attack at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Romanian politicians Category:Romanian journalists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania
title: Dragoș Petre Dumitriu
